abstract: National Center for Health Statistics says United States has resumed decline in its death rate, crucial metric for gauging country's overall health; unusual 2015 increase had worried researchers.

headline.print_headline: After a Rise,  Death Rate  Is Resuming  Its Decline
headline.main: U.S. Mortality Rate Declines, and Researchers Breathe a Sigh of Relief

snippet: The death rate, a key indicator of the health of a nation, was propelled to an increase last year in part because of drug overdoses....
lead_paragraph: The death rate, a key indicator of the health of a nation, was propelled to an increase last year in part because of drug overdoses.
